channel.title: The Joe Show
channel.description: Host Tobias Edgett discusses sports and current events.
channel.itunes:author: Tobias Edgett

item.title: Welcome to the Joe Show
item.itunes:title: Welcome to the Joe Show
item.description: Tobias discusses the current NBA season, sports in general, and current events in light of the COVID-19 pandemic.
item.itunes:summary: Tobias discusses the current NBA season, sports in general, and current events in light of the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: Episode 2: Q&A with Shay Shay and More
item.itunes:title: Q&A with Shay Shay and More
item.description: Tobias interviews Shayla and they discuss the current situation. Then, he answers viewer questions from Instagram including more on the present situation and speculation about sports.
item.itunes:summary: Tobias interviews Shayla and they discuss the current situation. Then, he answers viewer questions from Instagram including more on the present situation and speculation about sports

item.title: Episode 3: Talking with AJ... Yes Sir!
item.itunes:title: Talking with AJ... Yes Sir!
item.description: Tobias interviews AJ. Discussion includes sports, video games, and the current world situation.
item.itunes:summary: Tobias interviews AJ. Discussion includes sports, video games, and the current world situation.

item.title: Episode 4: Stories with JD
item.itunes:title: Stories with JD
item.description: Tobias and JD talk about old stories from playing baseball together.
item.itunes:summary: Tobias and JD talk about old stories from playing baseball together.

item.title: Episode 5: Joing with Professor
item.itunes:title: Joing with Professor
item.description: Tobias talks with Professor LaBair about a bunch of awesome stuff.
item.itunes:summary: Tobias talks with Professor LaBair about a bunch of awesome stuff.
